sample1.fullName: User Behavior Study for E-Commerce Checkout Flow Optimization
sample1.tableName: User Behavior Study for E-Commerce Checkout
sample1.intro:
This project investigates user behavior and pain points during e-commerce checkout processes.
Through usability testing and heuristic evaluation, we identified key friction points and proposed design improvements that reduced cart abandonment by 15%.
introList: Conducted usability testing with 20 participants across 3 platforms
Applied heuristic evaluation to identify UX issues
Proposed and validated redesign solutions with A/B testing
Published findings at a local UX research conference
sample1.fullNameEn: User Behavior Study for E-Commerce Checkout Flow Optimization
sample1.introEn:

introListEn: Conducted usability testing with 20 participants across 3 platforms

sample2.fullName: Smart Campus Navigation App UX Research & Design
sample2.tableName: Smart Campus Navigation App UX Research
sample2.intro:
This project explores how to design an intuitive wayfinding experience for new students navigating a large university campus.
Using contextual inquiry and behavior mapping, we analyzed spatial behavior patterns and designed a mobile navigation prototype.
The final design was validated through user testing with 30 participants.
introList: Conducted contextual inquiry with 15 new students
Created behavior maps of campus navigation patterns
Designed and prototyped a mobile navigation app in Figma
Validated design through usability testing with 30 participants

sample3.fullName: City Traffic Data Analysis & Machine Learning Prediction
sample3.intro:
This project analyzes urban traffic patterns using open government data.
By combining geospatial analysis with machine learning models, we predicted traffic congestion hotspots and proposed infrastructure improvement strategies.
introList: Collected and cleaned 50,000+ traffic records from open data portal
Applied GIS analysis to identify spatial patterns
Built and evaluated prediction models (Random Forest, XGBoost)
Created interactive dashboard for data visualization
